section1.title: THE LAGREE METHOD
section1.body:
FROM L.A TO TLV



CREATED BY SEBASTIEN LAGREE,

THIS REVOLUTIONARY METHOD REINVENTS THE WAY WE TRAIN:

A HIGHLY EFFECTIVE PRACTICE DESIGNED TO INTENSIFY EVERY EFFORT —

WITH ELEGANCE, STRENGTH, AND CONTROL.



MUSCLE STRENGTHENING, CARDIO, BALANCE, MOBILITY, DEEP CORE WORK, AND STRETCHING:

EVERYTHING COMES TOGETHER FOR SPECTACULAR RESULTS IN RECORD TIME.



SHORT SESSIONS... BUT IMPRESSIVELY INTENSE.

section2.title: THE MICRO DELUXE
section2.body:
AT THE HEART OF INNOVATION



AT STARLETTE,

LAGREE IS PRACTICED ON THE METHOD'S SIGNATURE MACHINE:

THE MICRO DELUXE.



COMPACT AND BRILLIANTLY ENGINEERED, IT FEATURES ADJUSTABLE RESISTANCE AND MOVING PLATFORM — ALLOWING FOR FULL-BODY ENGAGEMENT WHILE PROTECTING YOUR JOINTS.



POSTURE, ALIGNMENT, PRECISION:

EACH MOVEMENT IS SLOW, TARGETED, AND FULLY CONTROLLED.



IN 50 MINUTES ONLY: YOUR BODY TONES UP, YOUR SILHOUETTE LENGTHENS, YOUR POSTURE IS ELEVATED.
